allow:
Bash(python -c "
import sys
import os
sys.path.insert\(0, os.path.abspath\(''.''\)\)

try:
    import main
    print\(''Successfully imported main module''\)
    
    # Try to run with uvicorn
    import uvicorn
    print\(''Starting server...''\)
    uvicorn.run\(
        main.app,
        host=''0.0.0.0'',
        port=8000,
        reload=False,
        log_level=''info''
    \)
except ImportError as e:
    print\(f''Import error: {e}''\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {e}''\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)
")
